content: Hello! Welcome to the technical round of the interview. Can you start by telling me a little bit about your experience with AI project development, specifically with the chatbot you developed with real-time database integration? What were some of the challenges you faced during that project, and how did you overcome them?
Hello Sir, I am Jay Chandra.

Nice to meet you, Jeyachandran! I'm Jeyachandran too, but I think we're two different people. As a hiring officer, I'll be asking you some technical questions to assess your skills and experience. Let's get started.

So, you developed an AI chatbot with real-time database integration. Can you walk me through some of the key technologies you used in that project? For instance, what programming languages, frameworks, and tools did you utilize to build the chatbot?
